org.apache.flex.compiler.tree.mxml

Interface IMXMLClassDefinitionNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IASNode, ICommonClassNode, IDefinitionNode, IDocumentableDefinitionNode, IMXMLClassReferenceNode, IMXMLNode, IScopedDefinitionNode, ISourceLocation, ITypeNode
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IMXMLApplicationNode, IMXMLDocumentNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MXMLClassDefinitionNode, MXMLDocumentNode

    public interface IMXMLClassDefinitionNode
extends IMXMLClassReferenceNode, ICommonClassNode
    This AST node represents an MXML tag which defines a new class.

    It might be the document tag, or the tag inside a <Component> tag, or the tag inside a <Definition> tag.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.flex.compiler.common.ISourceLocation

        UNKNOWN
